questiontext.text: A Dutch couple is randomly chosen. Both the husband and wife will be asked the following question “Are you satisfied with your marriage? Each person answers with either”yes” or “no. A is the event that the man answers”yes. B is the event that the wife answers “yes. Care is taken to ensure that both spouses are not aware of the other’s answer. This is done by asking both persons the question at the same time in two different rooms.â  On substantive grounds

answer.text: We can be virtually assured that A and B are independent events .
